org.payments4j.spi.payflowpro
Class PayFlowProPaymentGateway

java.lang.Object
  org.payments4j.spi.payflowpro.PayFlowProPaymentGateway
All Implemented Interfaces:
PaymentGateway
public class PayFlowProPaymentGateway
extends Object
implements PaymentGateway

Payment Gateway for PayFlowPro. Implemented using the HTTPS interface.
